p: Statistics of spatial dispersal estimated from continuous phylogeographic analyses are reported in Table 1. Estimation of diffusion coefficients [ 27] allows different outbreaks to be directly and quantitatively compared [ 19]. Specifically, we found that the diffusion coefficient of RABV in Yunnan ( D = 1733 km 2/year; 95% HPD = 1082–2928) is on average substantially lower than that previously estimated for RABV among North African dogs ( D = 2874 km 2/year; 95% HPD = 1900–5420) [ 28].
